content:
From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
I have started testing macOS 26 Tahoe. So far it looks good, at least
metaphorically, in the sense that every appears to work fine. The actual look
of macOS 26 is a bit strange, something to get used to. It might well be the
next "Windows Vista", where strange look was advertized as "here to stay" and
later rolled back.

Makarius

From: Lawrence Paulson via isabelle-dev <isabelle-dev@mailman.proof.cit.tum.de>
Iâ€™ve been using it for a while, no problems.

Larry
On 4 Nov 2025 at 17:18 +0000, Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>, wrote:
I have started testing macOS 26 Tahoe. So far it looks good, at least
metaphorically, in the sense that every appears to work fine. The actual look
of macOS 26 is a bit strange, something to get used to. It might well be the
next "Windows Vista", where strange look was advertized as "here to stay" and
later rolled back.

Makarius

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
On 04/11/2025 18:17, Makarius wrote:

I have started testing macOS 26 Tahoe.

This virtual environment helps to test other macOS versions (12, 13, 14, 15)
on the same macOS 26 system: https://github.com/insidegui/VirtualBuddy

It appeared first for macOS 15, still a bit rough, and appears to be more
stable now.

Makarius
